Author: rotting_the_crown
Text: It was getting sluggish turning on, then today it didn’t turn on at all. I switched the batteries from my kitchen scale (because duh lmao), which I know works, and it didn’t turn on again :(  it’s okay though, it was circular and glass. Kind of took up a lot of awkward space and you had to be careful getting on it or it would tip. Hopefully I can find a better one!

Author: kilocalzz
Text: how did you tell it was broken? this is a dumb question lmao
